title: Neverwinter Nights Diamond Edition + Premium Modules
description:
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS


Neverwinter Nights Diamond / Kingmaker


 1. Install Neverwinter Nights Diamond Edition and Kingmaker.
 2. Apply the 1.69 update to patch the game to the latest version.


Premium Modules


 1. Install Pirates of the Sword Coast.
 2. Install Infinite Dungeons.
 3. Install Wyvern Crown of Cormyr.
 4. Install Darkness over Daggerford (overwrite the files at every window pop-up)
 5. Unzip & Install Tyrants of the Moonsea.


 a) Copy Moonsea.mod to your NWN Ã¢â‚¬Å“modulesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ folder.
 b) Copy Tyrants.hak to your NWN Ã¢â‚¬Å“hakÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ folder.
 c) Copy the music files in your NWN music directory.


 6. HeX coda 01


 a) Copy the .mod file into your MODULES directory.
 b) Copy the .tlk file into your TLK directory; make one if you don't have one.
 c) Copy the .hak files into your HAK directory.
 d) Copy the HEXCODA_MOD1.HAK in your HAK directory and overwrite the old one; Copy the BMU files into your MUSIC directory.


 7. HeX coda 02 (Incomplete Yet Finished Release)


 a) Copy the .mod file into your MODULES directory.
 b) Copy the .hak files into your HAK directory (overwrite hexcoda_ai.hak)
 c) Copy the music files in your NWN music directory.


 8. HeX coda MM: card battle arena


 a) Copy the .mod file into your MODULES directory.
 b) Copy the .hak files into your HAK directory. (overwrite hexcoda_modm.hak)


IMPORTANT NOTE!


 In order to be able to play the NWN Premium Modules, once selecting a module you must press Alt+Tab and click allow/unblock in your firewall pop-up window. You only need to do this one time/module.


Enjoy & Please Seed!
